member.name: T:Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Controls.CodeBlockResolvingEventArgs
member.summary: Arguments for the event when a Code Block is being rendered.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Controls.CodeBlockResolvingEventArgs.CodeLanguage
member.summary:
Gets the language of the Code Block, as specified by ```{Language} on the first line of the block, e.g.
```C#
public void Method();
```

member.summary: Fired when the text is done parsing and formatting. Fires each time the markdown is rendered.

member.summary: Fired when a link element in the markdown was tapped.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Controls.MarkdownTextBlock.ImageResolving
member.summary:
Fired when an image from the markdown document needs to be resolved. The default implementation is basically new BitmapImage(new Uri(e.Url));.
You must set to true in order to process your changes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Controls.MarkdownTextBlock.CodeBlockResolving
member.summary:
Fired when a Code Block is being Rendered. The default implementation is to output the CodeBlock as Plain Text.
You must set to true in order to process your changes.
